Class Tutorial

  • java.lang.Object
    • Lesson
      • Tutorial
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Tutorial
extends Lesson
implements java.io.Serializable
    subclass of Lesson and implements Serializable so that it can be serialized into the database
    See Also:
